verbs.description: CNN reporter [V: Will] [ARG0: Ripley] got the extremely rare chance to travel to North Korea this week ahead of Donald Trump 's meeting with their leader Kim Jong - Un . While there , Ripley got threatened by North Korean children who said they wanted to kill him because he 's American .
